channel.title: Help with a deprecated method
channel.description:
I am trying to change this deprecated method, located in Stream.java
[code]s.getBytes(0, s.length(), buffer, currentOffset);[/code]
To [code]s.getBytes();[/code]
The non-deprecated method works, Only up to the sendMessage voids, where it crashes the client completely. How do you stop this from happening either client-side or server-side?

item.title: Help with a deprecated method
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I am trying to change this deprecated method, located in Stream.java

s.getBytes(0, s.length(), buffer, currentOffset);

To

s.getBytes();

The non-deprecated method works, Only up to the sendMessage voids, where it crashes the client completely. How do you stop this from happening either client-side or server-side?

Read full topic
